Comment: Bessent is one of the more interesting characters in all of this.  If you look at who he is and his past and all that, it seems like he must be having some sort of prolonged out of body experience.  He has a solid grasp on trade and definitely has always had his sights lasered in on China but his take on how to negotiate with them (and probably anyone else) differs significantly from his boss.  It's funny in interviews to watch him shift from being able to speak as himself to having to get on script.  In this case the no new trade deals must be really easy for him to say given its absolute truth.
